name: Tentacular
summary:
Ten out of Tentacles!

Inhabit the giant body of a mighty-yet-mild tentacle monster raised by the quirky townsfolk of La Kalma, a remote island colony packed with puzzles.

Kraken your brain with 60+ mind bending puzzles
{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}

Tentacular is a heart-warming physics-based puzzler bursting with inventive, immersive gameplay and lots of humor to boot. Solve puzzles using playful tools to build strange contraptions and spectacular structures, or wreak havoc with your...
